java/liquibase/DatabaseChangeLog.java

00001 package liquibase;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.exception.LiquibaseException;
00005 import liquibase.exception.ValidationFailedException;
00006 import liquibase.parser.ChangeLogIterator;
00007 import liquibase.parser.filter.DbmsChangeSetFilter;
00008 import liquibase.parser.visitor.ValidatingVisitor;
00009 import liquibase.preconditions.AndPrecondition;
00010 import liquibase.preconditions.Preconditions;
00011 
00012 import java.util.ArrayList;
00013 import java.util.List;
00014 
00018 public class DatabaseChangeLog implements Comparable<DatabaseChangeLog> {
00019     private Preconditions preconditions;
00020     private String physicalFilePath;
00021     private String logicalFilePath;
00022 
00023     private List<ChangeSet> changeSets = new ArrayList<ChangeSet>();
00024 
00025     public DatabaseChangeLog(String physicalFilePath) {
00026         this.physicalFilePath = physicalFilePath;
00027     }
00028 
00029     public Preconditions getPreconditions() {
00030         return preconditions;
00031     }
00032 
00033     public void setPreconditions(Preconditions precond) {
00034         preconditions = precond;
00035     }
00036 
00037     public String getPhysicalFilePath() {
00038         return physicalFilePath;
00039     }
00040 
00041     public void setPhysicalFilePath(String physicalFilePath) {
00042         this.physicalFilePath = physicalFilePath;
00043     }
00044 
00045     public String getLogicalFilePath() {
00046         if (logicalFilePath == null) {
00047             return physicalFilePath;
00048         }
00049         return logicalFilePath;
00050     }
00051 
00052     public void setLogicalFilePath(String logicalFilePath) {
00053         this.logicalFilePath = logicalFilePath;
00054     }
00055 
00056     public String getFilePath() {
00057         if (logicalFilePath == null) {
00058             return physicalFilePath;
00059         } else {
00060             return logicalFilePath;
00061         }
00062     }
00063 
00064     public String toString() {
00065         return getFilePath();
00066     }
00067 
00068     public int compareTo(DatabaseChangeLog o) {
00069         return getFilePath().compareTo(o.getFilePath());
00070     }
00071 
00072 
00073     public ChangeSet getChangeSet(String path, String author, String id) {
00074         for (ChangeSet changeSet : changeSets) {
00075             if (changeSet.getFilePath().equals(path)
00076                     && changeSet.getAuthor().equals(author)
00077                     && changeSet.getId().equals(id)) {
00078                 return changeSet;
00079             }
00080         }
00081 
00082         return null;
00083     }
00084 
00085     public List<ChangeSet> getChangeSets() {
00086         return changeSets;
00087     }
00088 
00089     public void addChangeSet(ChangeSet changeSet) {
00090         this.changeSets.add(changeSet);
00091     }
00092 
00093     public boolean equals(Object o) {
00094         if (this == o) return true;
00095         if (o == null || getClass() != o.getClass()) return false;
00096 
00097         DatabaseChangeLog that = (DatabaseChangeLog) o;
00098 
00099         return getFilePath().equals(that.getFilePath());
00100 
00101     }
00102 
00103     public int hashCode() {
00104         return getFilePath().hashCode();
00105     }
00106 
00110     public void validate(Database database) throws LiquibaseException {
00111 
00112         ChangeLogIterator logIterator = new ChangeLogIterator(this, new DbmsChangeSetFilter(database));
00113 
00114         ValidatingVisitor validatingVisitor = new ValidatingVisitor(database.getRanChangeSetList());
00115         validatingVisitor.validate(database, this);
00116         logIterator.run(validatingVisitor, database);
00117 
00118         if (!validatingVisitor.validationPassed()) {
00119             throw new ValidationFailedException(validatingVisitor);
00120         }
00121     }
00122 
00123 }
